root: ^I thought you'd run home after the first fight.
^It seems like you came with me to help.
^Maybe you can start being useful already?
^Okay, I'm sorry, I just want you to take this task more seriously.
^Goblins are really weak, but who knows what this might turn out to be.
^Rumor has it that somewhere in this area there is a secret exit guarded by a dragon.
^If you decide to fight him, you first need to be properly prepared and look for useful items in the area.
